001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
006import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
008import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
009
010import java.net.URI;
011
012/**
013 * Configuration class for JSON-RPC client
014 *
015 * Contains complete URL, username, and password.
016 *
017 */
018public class RpcConfig {
019
020    private final Network network;
021    private final URI uri;
022    private final String   username;
023    private final String   password;
024
025    @Deprecated
026    public RpcConfig(NetworkParameters netParams, URI uri, String username, String password) {
027        this(netParams.network(), uri, username, password);
028    }
029
030    public RpcConfig(Network network, URI uri, String username, String password) {
031        this.network = network;
032        this.uri = uri;
033        this.username = username;
034        this.password = password;
035    }
036
037    public RpcConfig(String netIdString,  URI uri, String username, String password) {
038        this(BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(netIdString).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("invalid network string")),
039                uri,
040                username,
041                password);
042    }
043
044    @JsonCreator
045    public RpcConfig(@JsonProperty("netid")     String netIdString,
046                     @JsonProperty("uri")       String uri,
047                     @JsonProperty("username")  String username,
048                     @JsonProperty("password")  String password)  {
049        this(BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(netIdString).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("invalid network string")),
050                URI.create(uri),
051                username,
052                password);
053    }
054
055    @JsonIgnore
056    public Network network() {
057        return network;
058    }
059
060    @JsonIgnore
061    public NetworkParameters getNetParams() {
062        return NetworkParameters.of(network);
063    }
064
065    @JsonProperty("netid")
066    public String getNetIdString() {
067        return network.id();
068    }
069
070    public URI getURI() {
071        return uri;
072    }
073
074    public String getUsername() {
075        return username;
076    }
077
078    public String getPassword() {
079        return password;
080    }
081}
